text:
I had to install Julia on a windows computer the other day, it took forever...
Felt good about it though because after having waited forever, it felt like I suddenly had superpowers

elements.text:
I had to install Julia on a windows computer the other day, it took forever...
Felt good about it though because after having waited forever, it felt like I suddenly had superpowers

text: I've also note that installing packages and such takes so much longer than on Unix. The whole experience is a bit spoiled.

elements.text: I've also note that installing packages and such takes so much longer than on Unix. The whole experience is a bit spoiled.

text: I’m not looking forward to running Julia on Windows (on a new machine my son and I will be building as soon as we can get the parts - waiting to be able to get an nVidia RTX 3090).  Just how much longer does it take to get things installed on Windows?

elements.text: I’m not looking forward to running Julia on Windows (on a new machine my son and I will be building as soon as we can get the parts - waiting to be able to get an nVidia RTX 3090).  Just how much longer does it take to get things installed on Windows?

text: Cloning general and installing some packages took me some 10 minutes

elements.text: Cloning general and installing some packages took me some 10 minutes

text: I've been using Julia on Windows for work for ~2 yrs now. It's rough but Julia helps.

elements.text: I've been using Julia on Windows for work for ~2 yrs now. It's rough but Julia helps.

text: To speed up installation in Windows try `ENV["JULIA_PKG_SERVER"] = ""`
